titlestmt.titleproper: Winchester and Lexington Telephone Company cash book

repository.corpname: University of Kentucky Special Collections Research Center

did.unittitle: Winchester and Lexington Telephone Company cash book
did.abstract: The Winchester and Lexington Telephone Company cash book (dated 1898-1906; 0.05 cubic feet; 1 items) comprises a cash book owned by Horace Coleman, secretary and treasurer, that documents all receipts of cash and disbursements for the company.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to researchers by appointment.

bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: The Winchester and Lexington Telephone Company was a regional telephone company operating in Kentucky in the late nineteenth and early twentieth centuries. The secretary and treasurer was Horace Coleman.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: 2012ms741: [identification of item], Winchester and Lexington Telephone Company cash book, 1898-1906, University of Kentucky Libraries Special Collections Research Center.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Winchester and Lexington Telephone Company cash book (dated 1898-1906; 0.05 cubic feet; 1 items) comprises a cash book owned by Horace Coleman, secretary and treasurer, that documents all receipts of cash and disbursements for the company from 1898-1906.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The physical rights to the materials in this collection are held by the University of Kentucky Libraries Special Collections Research Center.

did.unittitle: Winchester and Lexington Telephone Company cash book
